content:
Nuisance of Waqf Board continues. 

Now reportedly, Waqf board has illegally occupied land & built a mosque over it in #HimachalPradesh.

Locals & BJP workers protesting against illegal construction of Sanjauli Mosque in Shimla.

Meantime, CM Sukhu was seen sleeping in Assembly… https://t.co/hdpnp7ICKq
